features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 8 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Stone Fragments
features.description: When you hit a target with an attack, you deal 4 damage to all other targets within your reach.

features.name: Siege Monster
features.description: You do double damage to objects and structures.

features.name: Slam
features.description: Melee: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., two targets or the same target twice. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Grab
features.description: Save: DC 15 vs STR, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: Target is grabbed. You can grapple up to 4 targets and your movement is not halved when grappling.

features.name: Crush
features.description: You deal 4 damage to every target you are grappling.

features.name: Throw Boulder
features.description: Ranged: DC 15 vs DEX, range 50 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (6d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
